nchack.create_ensemble¶

nchack.create_ensemble(path='', var=None, recursive=True)¶

Generate an ensemble

Parameters

  • path (str) – The system to search for netcdf files

  • var (str) – The variable the ensemble files must contain. This is ignored if not set.

  • recursive (boolean) – True/False depending on whether you want to search the path recursively. Defaults to True.

Returns

A list of files

Return type

list
